forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 47F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
